posts.message:
Today i made many modifications on my chrome extension Social-Filter... 
Also uploaded an Opera browser version... 
Hope you like it... 

The Chrome Extension :
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/social-filter/pahdoafacnmoblppkhfjaicdmlkplinj

The Opera Extension : 
https://addons.opera.com/en/extensions/details/social-filter/?display=en

Github Repo :
https://github.com/Ahmed-Badawy/Social-Filter-Chrome-Extension

Please Star the Repo if you like it...

posts.message:
Going to write some Medium post about Internet Banking in Egypt, including some cases considering Stability and Security. It will be very much appreciated to help through this poll !
--
How can You describe the Internet Banking You're using ?
--
( You can choose multiple options, whatever apply )

Please how set featured image wordpress for many posts in same time or for all posts ?

hi , can anybody help please .

[ the question about cross domain request ] .

scenario :

1- there is a web site X.com , i give it a script to include in ,the server of the web site not under my control .

2- the script fetch some data and send the data to web app under domain the y.com .

3- after the web app process the data , it send the response back to the x.com  in json format 

4- the script use the data to make a cheanges in x.com 

my research efforts :

i have found two two ways to cross domain requests , jsonp and Cross-Origin Resource Sharing ( CORS ) .

jsonp it seem for getting data only not for posting data and  there some security concern which i don't understand it well .

CORS it seem to be the solution but all example i have seen in geting data . and i don't know how post the data the script fetch  
or anyone recommend another method

thanks and sorry for your time

لو حد لسه طالب وعايز يكمل IT شبكات ايه هيا الكورسات الي محتاج يبدا يذكرها وبشتغل عليها من دلوقت عشان لما يتخرج يقدر يلاقي شغل ؟؟؟
شكرا مقدما

HELP ! Do you know a good "Beacons" supplier in Egypt ?

I need 300 pieces.

عاوزه اعرف لو انا هبدأ ستارت اب تكون مسئولة عن انتاج وتطوير كذا ابليكيشن بيخدموا فكره واحده كبيره 
زي lumowell كده
http://www.lumowell.com/
هحتاج اقرأ عن ايه واتعلم ايه عشان اقدر ابقا مسئولة عن الموضوع ده 
بحيث اقدر اكون تيم واقدر ادير الموضوع كله بطريقه احترافية 
مع العلم اني junior full stack developer 
محتاجه بس ارتب الطريق اللي همشي فيه بعد كده انشالله ياخد كذا سنه دراسه عادي 
المهم بس اعرف محتاجه اتعلم ايه 
وحاجه زي كده ببقا محتاجه مجالات ايه تاني معايا في التيم

posts.description: Lumowell offers videos, apps and articles about fitness and wellness to get a perfect body. Workouts and tips to lose weight, tone your body and improve your health.

posts.message:
السلام عليكم

ممكن نصيحة فى تصميم تقرير طباعة باركود

هل telerik report افضل فى الموضوع ده ام devexpress report وليه ؟

الـraspberry pi 3 تمنها في مصر 625 جنيه عند grand solutions و على aliexpress بـ40 دولار والشحن مجاني لمصر يعني بسعر البنك حوالي 360 جنيه، بس المفروض إن فيه جمارك وتصريحات وكلام سخيف كده، فلو حد اشترى قريب أي components من Aliexpress ممكن يقولي هل الأحسن إني اشتريها من مصر وخلاص ولا لو جبتها من aliexpress هتكون ارخص بعد الجمارك؟

يا ريت حد من الجيكس اللي لهم في الشبكات وخلافه يشوف المقال ده على ويكيبيديا عن Internet Backbone واللي فيه جزء مخصص عن مصر. السؤال بناءا على المقال أو غيره: هل مصر تعتبر جزء من العمود الفقري للإنترنت؟
posts.caption: en.wikipedia.org
posts.description: The Internet backbone may be defined by the principal data routes between large, strategically interconnected computer networks and core routers on the Internet. These data routes are hosted by commercial, government, academic and other high-capacity network centers, the Internet exchange points and...
